translations: n.人行道（pavement 的复数）；道路

phrs.translation: 混凝土路面；混凝土面层
没住宿地；徘徊街头；被遗弃
柔性路面；沥青路面；柔性地面铺装

sentences.sentence: Cyclists jump on and off pavements and ride at speed along the pavements.
sentences.translation: 骑自行车的人在人行道上跳上跳下，并且沿着人行道高速行驶。

sentences.sentence: The route of the pedestrian will be defined by the widest pavements possible with a hypsometric difference from the road.
sentences.translation: 行人的路线将由最宽的人行道来确定，并与道路形成分层。
